title: Software Engineer, AI/ML, Learning Platform
location: Mountain View, CA, USA; New York, NY, USA
description: Google's software engineers develop the next-generation technologies that change how billions of users connect, explore, and interact with information and one another.
key_qualifications: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent practical experience. 1 year of experience with software development in one or more programming languages (e.g., Python, C, C++, Java, JavaScript). 1 year of experience with AI/ML techniques including generative AI, Natural Language Processing (NLP), information retrieval, etc.
preferred_qualifications: Master's degree in Computer Science or a related technical field. 2 years of experience with AI/ML techniques including generative AI, Natural Language Processing (NLP), information retrieval, etc. Experience in driving research progress, technical transfer from research to products, or product improvements that depend critically on AI/ML. Passion for education.
responsibilities: Develop, test, deploy, and maintain large-scale software systems using AI/ML techniques including generative AI, natural language processing, information retrieval, etc. Build, develop, evaluate, and improve the quality of AI models. Ship these capabilities on various Google surfaces meeting required quality and latency requirements. Collect and analyze data to understand the problem and suggest the best technical approach to address it. Participate in design review with stakeholders.
